detail_desc: Knee-length dress in a rib knit containing some wool with a wrapover top that fastens with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.

Sleeveless top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood and a kangaroo pocket.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit silk and cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit silk and cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.

Fully-fashioned trainers with plastic details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with short, lace-trimmed sleeves. Lined.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and collar that ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, long, wide sleeves and cuffs with a slit, covered buttons and flounce. Partly lined.
Trainers in mesh with lace embroidery, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas insoles and rubber soles.

Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, elasticated lacing at the front and a glittery loop at the back. Mesh insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Knee-length dress in soft ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck with a twisted detail at the front for a draped look. Short sleeves, a seam under the bust and wrapover skirt.
Calf-length dress in soft modal jersey with a wrapover that has gathers at one side for a draped effect.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a detachable braided imitation suede belt, short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a detachable braided imitation suede belt, short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Poncho in a patterned weave containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a fringed hem. No fasteners.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Elastication at the back and ties at the front.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top and decorative tie belt.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top and decorative tie belt.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch twill with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch twill with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

High-waisted dungarees in washed cotton denim with a V-neck, adjustable, crossover straps with metal fasteners at the back and a fake fly. Patch front pockets, a concealed zip at the back and wide, straight legs.
Imitation leather loafers with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.

Fancy dress unicorn cape in soft pile with a padded hood with a sewn-on horn and ears, and a contrasting colour mane. Embroidered eyes, padded wings on the back and a detachable tail. Open dolman sleeves with pockets for the hands at the cuffs.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Set with a sweatshirt and pair of joggers. Long-sleeved sweatshirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Sandals with crossover straps in imitation leather with a large decorative metal buckle, moulded insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Sandals with crossover straps in imitation leather with a large decorative metal buckle, moulded insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Straight-style joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front and back pockets, a fake fly and legs with decorative seams at the knees and narrow hems.
V-neck body in soft, ribbed jersey with a draped wrapover top layer at the front. Narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
